file_content.text: [Nothing happens. The altar is silent.]
This war is needless. There is no conflict.
You deny the vision of a Mystic. Silence.
It is not safe here, honored one. The war you foresaw has begun.
Besides the Gormak, things look pretty peaceful outside.
War? What war?
The other commandos have yet to strike. There has been disagreement.
I'm not a Mystic. I'm not even Voss.
You've got the wrong person.
Your doubt is poison. The Mystic is unwell.
I cleared the path. I have the right to explore.
I'm allowed to be here.
As you say, honored one. Some dare to question.
Many Voss will die. There should be no doubt.
Your vision started this war, honored one. Will you guide us?
I'm no Mystic, but I can try....
As much as an outsider can.
We ask only for a Mystic's guidance.
I don't understand.
You are a Mystic. Answer as you were taught.
If I have to, I guess.
Your response will determine our fate.
You saw a bloody civil war between Voss. After the war ended, you saw the Voss flourish.
The Voss have split into two sides to do your will. We battle until one side achieves victory. The other dies.
The war will lead to peace and prosperity.
Killing each other? What good will that do?
That's ridiculous!
War will eliminate those who would lead us into disaster.
You assume a lot.
The interpreters are certain.
Sounds like you've already made your decision.
So get fighting, then.
A Voss does not kill a Voss. This is law.
We do what is necessary for our future.
At what cost? Countless Voss will die.
We follow your vision, honored one. Should this war continue?
Whatever I saw, I didn't want it to lead to war.
No. I can't condone this.
The Mystics do not always see good fortune.
Sometimes you have to make sacrifices.
Yes, if the vision says so.
As you have seen.
Stop. You do not belong here.
The shrine is for the Mystics. Your vision was proven false.
Maybe I need to complete the trials first.
I'm still learning.
The trials cannot teach the blind to see.
I don't even know what I saw.
What vision?
You say that like I've broken some kind of Mystic law.
That sounds bad.
A Mystic sees truth.
You saw the outsiders destroy Voss-Ka.
The outsiders are here. Voss-Ka thrives.
You cannot be a Mystic. You must leave.
Whatever your judgment is, I'll follow it.
You're right. I'll leave.
A Mystic is never wrong. You are.
Maybe the vision meant something else.
No. I think you're wrong.
Interpreters can make mistakes. A Mystic cannot.
I am your escort, honored one. We cannot delay.
The Mystics have had a vision. The interpreters have chosen you.
Your sacrifice will defeat the Gormak.
You want me to sacrifice myself to the Gormak?
Let me get this straight.
You can't be serious.
The vision was clear.
I get a say in this, right?
And what if I refuse?
Only a coward avoids his fate.
A Mystic will die. The Gormak will fall.
We do what is necessary for our future.
I'll give my life to protect the Voss.
The vision must be followed.
Even a Mystic must sacrifice.
You can't force me to sacrifice myself.
Are you crazy? I won't do it!
You condemn us all.
Your vision troubles me, honored one.
The Three must be seen. Only a Mystic can choose.
You name a child to serve. I must step down.
The child could use your experience.
Stay and help.
The Three shall never grow. This is law.
The child's there for a reason.
I don't choose what I see.
Has a child ever served the Three before?
You assume the worst.
The past proves nothing.
I have served for years. A child cannot lead as I have.
I do not deny. I ask you to look again.
I'll try, but I can't promise anything.
A second look can't hurt.
A Mystic will always see the truth.
A Mystic's words have weight. You understand.
I can't change what I saw.
You'll have to live with it.
A Voss may question.
Move on. Learn to focus. Destroy the source.
[The altar cannot be activated right now.]
You return home. Your family has missed you.
You must know our suffering.
Your vision has brought ruin.
How did my vision affect you?
What kind of ruin?
I can't help what I see.
You have influence.
I'm a Mystic now. I don't owe you anything.
That's your problem.
Mystics remain tied to their family.
You saw famine. The Three must survive.
The Three feast. Your family starves. You must help.
I'll make sure you get what you need.
I'll do everything I can.
That is not a Mystic's role.
You are not a Mystic. You do not understand.
A Mystic sees. You stumble. You will be purged.
I don't have any power over the Three's decisions.
The Three rule. I can't help.
The Mystics see. The Three decide.
A Mystic's words have weight. You understand.
Move on. Learn to focus. Destroy the source.
Forgive me, honored one. A guardian protects the Mystics.
You saw yourself in the Nightmare Lands alone. You prepare here.
The Nightmare Lands are dangerous. A Mystic cannot enter alone.
What does a Mystic fear besides death?
But anyone else can?
Darkness. Madness.
What are the Nightmare Lands?
Nightmare Lands?
A dark forest. The ancient heart of Voss.
I'll do what I want.
Your safety is my life.
The Nightmare Lands create twisted beasts, lost men.
I can escort you. You will return safely to Voss-Ka.
You know the area. I'd appreciate the help.
I could use a guide.
The guardians were not in your vision.
You are not a Mystic. You do not understand.
A Mystic sees. You stumble. You will be purged.
I have to face the Nightmare Lands alone.
I must follow my vision.
As you have seen.
A Mystic's words have weight. You understand.
Move on. Learn to focus. Destroy the source.
You are not a Mystic. You do not understand.
A Mystic sees. You stumble. You will be purged.
A Mystic's words have weight. You understand.
Move on. Learn to focus. Destroy the source.
You are not a Mystic. You do not understand.
A Mystic sees. You stumble. You will be purged.
A Mystic's words have weight. You understand.
Move on. Learn to focus. Destroy the source.
A Mystic's words have weight. You understand.
Move on. Learn to focus. Destroy the source.
You are not a Mystic. You do not understand.
A Mystic sees. You stumble. You will be purged.
You are not a Mystic. You do not understand.
A Mystic sees. You stumble. You will be purged.
